## ConfigurableProductOptionsValues interface

ConfigurableProductOptionsValues contains the index number assigned to a configurable product option

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ConfigurableProductOptionsValues 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [default\_label?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptionsvalues.default_label.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The label of the product on the default store |
|  [label?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptionsvalues.label.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The label of the product |
|  [store\_label?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptionsvalues.store_label.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The label of the product on the current store |
|  [swatch\_data?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptionsvalues.swatch_data.md) | Maybe&lt;[SwatchDataInterface](./magento-api.swatchdatainterface.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Swatch data for configurable product option |
|  [uid?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptionsvalues.uid.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['ID'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The unique ID for a <code>ConfigurableProductOptionsValues</code> object |
|  [use\_default\_value?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptionsvalues.use_default_value.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Boolean'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether to use the default\_label |
|  [value\_index?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptionsvalues.value_index.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A unique index number assigned to the configurable product option |
